title: Tri-Mania
content: a little help from my friends plz ![trimania](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111121254im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/49040.jpg)
author: negood

comments.content:
thanks Yves ... I wished I had gotten a few more ideas on this one ... but thanks anyway for all your help   
   
wayne

Wayne, if you'r estill looking for suggestions, some other similar faces include Tolstrup Pryds' [Dont Blurry](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111121254/http:/www.identifont.com/show?CSL), Neville Brody's [FF Blur](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111121254/http:/www.identifont.com/show?1DW) series ans Image Club's [Overprint](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111121254/http:/www.identifont.com/show?8O6) family.
Thanks Grant!! The Overprint seems to be very close.

You're very welcome.   
   
Gah, my typing was atrocious in that last post...
